com.example.team04adventure.Model

Class JSONparser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.team04adventure.Model.JSONparser

  • public class JSONparser
extends java.lang.Object
    JSONparser deals with the storage on the server. It stores stories and users, is able to get stories and users and is able to search them. Parts of this class were taken from the CMPUT301 Json demo code.
    Author:
    Team04Adventure
